<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>YouTube Video Embed</title>
</head>
<body>
    <script src="ytvideo.js"></script>
    <script>
        // Example usage
        render("https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DBAQRY1MTUY", 560, 315);
 render("https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pk5fpXjPsDM", 560, 315);
 render("https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TFMgrbAGtDM", 560, 315);


    </script>
</body>
</html>
